title: The Serene Lens: The Adventures of Ivan Watson
summary: A young photographer, Ivan Watson, discovers his ability to manipulate time through his camera, using it to right wrongs over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Ein junger Fotograf, Ivan Watson, entdeckt seine Fähigkeit, durch seine Kamera die Zeit zu manipulieren, und nutzt sie, um im Laufe einer Woche Ungerechtigkeiten zu beseitigen.
summaryDutch: Een jonge fotograaf, Ivan Watson, ontdekt zijn vermogen om tijd te manipuleren met zijn camera, en gebruikt dit om gedurende een week misstanden recht te zetten.
summaryFrench: Un jeune photographe, Ivan Watson, découvre sa capacité à manipuler le temps grâce à son appareil photo, l'utilisant pour corriger des torts au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: While meditating in the park, Ivan accidentally captures a strange phenomenon in the background of his photo, a time ripple. Intrigued, he decides to explore this anomaly further.
Ivan experiments with his camera and discovers that he can manipulate short moments of time by capturing them. Excited, he resolves to use this power responsibly.
Ivan observes a robbery and uses his newfound power to rewind the moment, capturing evidence and preventing the crime. He feels a mix of thrill and uncertainty.
After preventing a crime, Ivan is both excited and nervous about the implications of his powers. He spends the day meditating to find peace and clarity.
With new resolve, Ivan stops a potential accident by freezing time just long enough. His confidence in controlling his ability grows.
Ivan meets another individual with similar powers. They share experiences and techniques, forging a bond and deciding to work together for greater causes.
Testing his limits, Ivan and his new ally successfully avert a natural disaster from causing havoc, saving countless lives and realizing the full potential of their powers.

ending: Thus, Ivan Watson learned that with great power comes great responsibility, a maxim he vowed to live by.
moral: The journey to mastering great power responsibly often starts with a single curious moment.
